description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Welcome to the coninuting adventures of lunch time combat in Revenge of the Sammich 2. Take control of an intrepid Carrot facing off against a hoard of Wheat and Rye. Pick up powerful weapons like the shotgun, the magnum, and the all powerful shockwave.
description.short: Welcome to the coninuting adventures of lunch time combat in Revenge of the Sammich 2. Take control of an intrepid Carrot facing off against a hoard of Wheat and Rye. Pick up powerful weapons like the shotgun, the magnum, and the all powerful shockwave.
